price: 12. Iyo sidoo kale Maryam, gabadhii Cimraan, taasoo xafidday farjigeeda; waxaana ka afuufnay (jeebka cambuurkeeda) uu ka afuufay (malag Jabriil), waxayna rumeysay Kelmedihii Rabbigeed iyo Kutubtiisa, kana mid aheyd kuwa Alle adeeca.
arabic: وَمَرۡيَمَ ٱبۡنَتَ عِمۡرَٰنَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَحۡصَنَتۡ فَرۡجَهَا فَنَفَخۡنَا فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِنَا وَصَدَّقَتۡ بِكَلِمَٰتِ رَبِّهَا وَكُتُبِهِۦ وَكَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡقَٰنِتِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamaryama ib'nata ʿim'rāna allatī aḥṣanat farjahā fanafakhnā fīhi min rūḥinā waṣaddaqat bikalimāti rabbihā wakutubihi wakānat mina al-qānitīna
